newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy telecom shares to resume in Milan at 1330GMT.
newsitem.headline: Italy telecom shares to resume in Milan at 1330GMT.

text.p: Shares in Italian state telecoms companies Telecom Italia and Stet will resume price-fixing at 1330 GMT with trading due to start at 1340, traders said.
Both ordinary and savings stocks in the two companies were suspended earlier pending an announcement following a shareholders' meeting at state industrial holding Iri.
The Italian Treasury then said Iri is to transfer Stet to the Treasury for a minimum 14.53 trillion lire and the Treasury will pay Iri three trillion by the end of the year and the rest by June 30.
